After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.EXPLANATION: Percentage of accurate predictions made for maintenance needs compared to actual maintenance requirements, reflecting the effectiveness of predictive maintenance strategies.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.FORMULA: (Accurate Predictive Maintenance Alerts / Total Predictive Maintenance Alerts) * 100

After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.KPIS: Maintenance cost savings from predictive maintenance.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.EXPLANATION: Financial savings achieved through predictive maintenance compared to traditional maintenance methods, calculated as the reduction in maintenance costs.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.FORMULA: (Maintenance Cost Before Predictive Maintenance - Maintenance Cost After Predictive Maintenance) / Maintenance Cost Before Predictive Maintenance * 100

After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.KPIS: Downtime reduction due to predictive maintenance.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.EXPLANATION: Measure of the reduction in vehicle or equipment downtime as a result of implementing predictive maintenance techniques.
Financial return achieved from predictive maintenance initiatives compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Predictive Maintenance / Total Cost of Predictive Maintenance) * 100

After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.EXPLANATION: Percentage of maintenance operations using predictive maintenance techniques compared to the total number of maintenance operations.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.FORMULA: (Number of Assets Using Predictive Maintenance / Total Number of Assets) * 100

After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.EXPLANATION: Measure of the reduction in the time from identifying a potential maintenance issue to completing the maintenance task through predictive techniques.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.FORMULA: (Previous Lead Time - Current Lead Time) / Previous Lead Time * 100

After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.KPIS: Predictive maintenance compliance with maintenance schedules.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.EXPLANATION: Degree to which predictive maintenance activities adhere to planned maintenance schedules, measured through schedule adherence metrics.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.FORMULA: (Number of Maintenance Tasks Completed on Schedule / Total Number of Maintenance Tasks) * 100

After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.KPIS: Predictive maintenance improvement in asset reliability.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.EXPLANATION: Measure of the increase in asset reliability as a result of implementing predictive maintenance strategies, assessed through reliability metrics.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Pr.FORMULA: (Current Asset Reliability - Previous Asset Reliability) / Previous Asset Reliability * 100
